DOC.brief_summary: We plan analyze data meet primary objective study : To characterize change bone mineral density ( BMD ) , measure lumbar spine DEXA , follow treatment tenofovir DF-containing antiretroviral therapy HIV-infected child . In addition , plan analyze data meet 2 secondary objective study : 1 . To study monitor marker bone metabolism - calcium , phosphorus , parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) , vitamin D level , bone resorption marker ( urinary collagen cross-linked N-telopeptide free deoxypyridinoline ) , bone formation marker ( bone specific alkaline phosphatase osteocalcin ) - HIV-infected child treat tenofovir DF-containing antiretroviral therapy . 2 . To study immunologic , virologic clinical effect tenofovir DF administer HIV-infected child combination antiretroviral therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Data Analysis 04-C-0234 Tenofovir Disoproxil Fumarate Salvage Therapy HIV-Infected Children Study Its Effect Bone Metabolism
DOC.detailed_description: We plan analyze data meet primary objective study : To characterize change bone mineral density ( BMD ) , measure lumbar spine DEXA , follow treatment tenofovir DF-containing antiretroviral therapy HIV-infected child . In addition , plan analyze data meet 2 secondary objective study : 1 . To study monitor marker bone metabolism - calcium , phosphorus , parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) , vitamin D level , bone resorption marker ( urinary collagen cross-linked N-telopeptide free deoxypyridinoline ) , bone formation marker ( bone specific alkaline phosphatase osteocalcin ) - HIV-infected child treat tenofovir DF-containing antiretroviral therapy . 2 . To study immunologic , virologic clinical effect tenofovir DF administer HIV-infected child combination antiretroviral therapy .
